channel.title: Baon Lunchbox Featured on The Ulampinoy Project
channel.description: Recent content in Baon Lunchbox Featured on The Ulampinoy Project

item.title: Tupperlicious – Adobo & Laing
item.description: Chicken Adobo – this is the leftover adobo but more flavorful – more concentrated as a result of post-marination of the meat in its sauce. Chicken adobong tuyo Spinach Laing – a special version of the traditional laing made of taro leaves! Lunchbox of rice and laing of spinach We’ve got some dried dilis (anchovies) and this time sautéed in bagoong alamang (fermented shrimp paste).
